short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get air quality data for properties and cars.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get air quality data for properties and cars. We are the team dedicated to provide the information about air quality of given car model, apartments. In krisha.kz we get information about given apartment like its location(lat, lng) and provide air quality of given location. In kolesa.kz we get car model, and provide emission index of given car model.
